title: Karmas R + W and R + E
body: I have played Karma a certain time and those combos did not work.

replies.body: In a slightly irrelevant note: There's a rework to Karma's W and E in the works now coming soon to the PBE. Announced in surrender@20.

Well, a change in how mantra interacts with them anyway.
I'm actually really sad about that, spirit visage R+W Karma was one of my favourite things. Stupid amounts of bait potential.

Well that is very much a problem with you then, because Karma is one of my main mids and I've never had an issue.
Support ticket I guess if it happens consistently, if you can't recreate the problem then it must have just been a glitch.
